scripts.robot: npm run prep && npm run build && npm run export && npm run renderActionShots
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; rm -rf .next; rm -rf public; mkdir public;
scripts.getResources: rm -rf ./public; mkdir public; npm run getUiCSS; npm run getStatic
scripts.prep: npm run getResources && npm run makeGamePages && npm run importGameImages && npm run importNewsImages
